article_title: Supreme Court Objects to Application of Sarbanes-Oxley on Commercial Fisherman
article_text:
WASHINGTON—The Supreme Court on Wednesday appeared ready to throw federal prosecutors overboard for applying the Sarbanes-Oxley corporate governance law to a commercial-fisherman accused of destroying evidence that he harvested undersized fish.

“He could have gotten 20 years!” Justice Antonin Scalia said of the maximum jail term the fisherman...

twitter.description: Supreme Court justices on Wednesday objected to the Justice Department’s application of Sarbanes-Oxley on a commercial fisherman accused of destroying evidence that he harvested undersized fish.
